summary: Comprehensive testing of WeForYou Foundation donation platform completed. All core functionalities are working including user authentication, campaign management, donation flow with mock payments, receipt generation, pledge management, and admin dashboard. Minor UI issues identified with dropdown interactions.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown items not clickable due to overlay issues

passed_tests: Donation creation and mock payment flow
My Donations page with donation history
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix dropdown interaction issue in status filter component - likely caused by z-index or overlay problems preventing clicks on dropdown items
